title: Calories in an In-N-Out Burger
meta_description: Get the calories in an In-N-Out burger: 390 kcal for the standard hamburger, plus protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and tweaks for custom orders.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out hamburger: 100% beef patty, sesame bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, Thousand Island-style spread; grilled, no cheese or modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, patty size, bun freshness, and customizations. Values based on official In-N-Out data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A standard In-N-Out burger provides 390 kcal, 16 g protein, and 19 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, grilled onions, mustard-fried patty)
Protein style (wrapped in lettuce, no bun)

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out burger?
What are the macros for an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: 16 g protein, 19 g fat, 39 g carbs (3 g fiber).

faqs.q: How much sodium is in an In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: About 730 mg, mostly from the spread and bun.

faqs.q: Does adding cheese change In-N-Out burger calories much?
faqs.a: Yes, it adds ~50 kcal, making it a cheeseburger at 440 kcal.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out burger calories for a single patty?
faqs.a: Yes, the standard is one patty; double adds ~250 more kcal.
